data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bageshwar, Uttarakhand, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bageshwar, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Bageshwar, Uttarakhand, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Bageshwar that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Bageshwar to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Dhobi (Muslim traditions) people might believe through him.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Bageshwar words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 2,859 believers in Bageshwar and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Bageshwar, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Bageshwar
location.people_groups_list: Tharu Rana, Shah, Bhoksa, Pashtun, Pathan, Badhai (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tharu Rana (12,000), Shah (6,000), Bhoksa (59,000), Pashtun, Pathan (11,419,000), Badhai (Muslim traditions) (586,000)
